===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しおき|し|tr1=shi|t1=doing|pos1=stem of verb {{ja-l|する}} ''suru'' “to do”|置き|tr2=oki|t2=putting, placing|pos2=stem of verb {{ja-l|置く}} ''oku'' “to put, to place”}}. The {{ja-l|仕}} character is an example of [[ateji]].<ref>{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
